title: Real Manufacturing and Trade Industries Sales
notes:
BEA Account Code: KPMT
Real Manufacturing and Trade Industries Sales is used in the calculation of CMRMTSPL (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CMRMTSPL). This series is based on the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS), which replaced the Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) system. The SIC is no longer published with this release, and the SIC series is HMRMT (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/HMRMT).
